about_the_game:
Pilots, Rise up.

Pilot a zero gravity craft and weld various devices to it surface in order to survive waves of deadly enemies in various modes including: Endless and Challenges.

Your ship is fast, agile and modular. It's all about movement and avoiding enemies.

Welding

Devices can be attached anywhere on your ship. All of these kits have specific functions to keep you alive a minute longer.
Pick your kits wisely to maximize damage, agility or whatever strategy you fancy.

Score Leaderboards

Compete with your friends to get the highest score on any of the challenges or modes.

Radio

Jam out to the tunes provided in the in-game radio. Get in the zone and crank out the highest score you can.
